node.text:
Sound on 🔊 Perfecting your jammy egg? Or maybe you haven’t quite yet nailed the elusive poached egg technique. These methods are really quite easy, and once you get the hang of it, you’ll be putting a poached egg on everything from avocado toast to soup to salads.

TIPS
Poached:
→ Crack eggs into small bowls first to alleviate the issue of breaking the yolk.
→  Work quickly to get all the eggs into the water at the same time.
→ Transfer to paper towel-lined plate to absorb excess moisture. 
→ Adding vinegar to water for poached eggs helps the whites to coagulate and stay neat.

Scrambled:
→ Add a touch of milk to scrambled eggs for extra creaminess. 
→ Cook over low heat and pull from heat before fully set. 

Jammy: 
→ Cook jammy eggs for exactly 6 ½ minutes and immediately transfer to ice bath and let cool for ten minutes. 

Get the recipes & learn more at: bit.ly/2YAOF1f. Stay tuned for more quick how-tos and seasonal recipes.

node.text:
Sound on 🔊 Hey @crateandkids, did you hear about this one? Puff pastry turnovers are great for busy, back-to-school weekdays when you need a fast and easy, kid-friendly dinner. Plus, they’re a versatile (and tasty) way to put extra fruits, veggies and leftovers to use. Which combo sounds like your fam’s fave: 1. Chicken, Gruyère and Pesto 2. Ham, Cheese and Tomato 3. Broccoli and Cheese or 4. Spinach, Artichoke Hearts and Feta? 

TIPS
→ Thaw puff pastry by sticking it in the fridge the night before.
→ Frozen puff pastry is one of the most versatile kitchen staples, so we highly recommend always having it in your freezer! 
→ Make ahead and freeze without the egg wash step.
→  To bake from frozen, just add a few minutes of cooking time in the oven to this recipe (no need to defrost first). Make sure your oven is fully preheated to achieve a flaky dough.

node.text:
Sound on 🔊 New weeknight dinner recipe! Cut down on prep and cleanup time with one pan of spiced, oven-roasted chickpeas drizzled with a lemony yogurt sauce. This vegan meal has an array of colorful vegetables and uses warm spices like curry, cumin and smoked paprika to make a super-flavorful dish inspired by Indian cuisine. Finished off with fresh cilantro and a delicious cooling yogurt sauce, these oven-roasted chickpeas are sure to be in regular rotation in your house.

TIPS
→ Combine spices with olive oil first for even distribution.
→ Use a silpat to keep caramelization on food.
→ Cut everything the same size for even cooking.
→ Don’t overcrowd the pan as crowded foods tend to steam versus roast.

Get the recipes & learn more at: bit.ly/3xlkBCE. Stay tuned for more quick how-tos and seasonal recipes.

node.text:
Sound on 🔊 Make the most of what’s left of grilling season by making our juiciest chicken ever—topped with fresh, homemade Chimichurri sauce. This herby, green sauce is an easy way to level up your favorite protein. 

TIPS
→ Use chicken breast with skin on to lock all of the flavors.
→ Hand-chop your herbs to avoid creating a watery sauce.
→ The fresher the herbs, the greener the sauce.

Get the recipes & learn more at: bit.ly/3l5WqFK and stay tuned for more quick how-tos and seasonal recipes.

node.text:
Sound on 🔊 Use those juicy, sour red gems in a delicious (and easy!) hand pie. 🥧  Top with whipped cream or vanilla ice cream and serve at your next summer celebration. Use the @oxo Multi-Cherry Pitter for mess-free ease in baking.

TIPS
→ Make sure your oven is fully preheated to achieve a nice flaky dough.
→ Use ice-cold butter and water for flaky dough.
→ A marble board helps keep dough cold. 
→ Hand pies freeze beautifully—they’re a great make-ahead option.

Get the recipes & learn more at: link. Stay tuned for more quick how-tos and seasonal recipes.

node.text:
Say hello to summer brunch with this super delicious, homemade Bloody Mary mix. Use it to set up a fun self-serve bar. It gets guests excited and takes bartending off your plate. 

TIPS
→ Garnish with classic mix-ins like Tabasco & celery and rim your glasses with lemon juice & tajín. 
→ Use the ripest and darkest tomatoes you can find at the peak of the season, as they will have the most flavor.
→ Fresh tomato juice will be much lighter in color than store-bought mixes, many of which contain other ingredients to intensify the red.
→ Refrigerate beforehand to let the flavors develop.

Get the recipe & learn more at: bit.ly/3hpUNR2. Stay tuned for more quick how-tos and seasonal recipes.

node.text:
What makes you feel most at home? For recipe developer Quin Liburd, it’s where she can unapologetically, unequivocally be who she is without any judgment. 🏠🤍 This #Pride month and beyond, everyone should experience the acceptance of home. #HomeIsForEveryone is our initiative to share messages of hope and create safe spaces for the LGBTQIA+ community, in partnership with @itgetsbetter. 🏳️‍🌈
“When I put together a meal and I invite my loved ones over, everybody at the table is people that just make me feel good. That support me, my life decisions. That support me in who I am.”
#PrideMonth #Pride2021 #ItGetsBetter #CrateandBarrel

node.text:
What makes you feel most at home? For couple Alyssa, Sam and their little girl Avery, it means being together. 🏠🤍 This #Pride month and beyond, everyone should experience the acceptance of home. #HomeIsForEveryone is our initiative to share messages of hope and create safe spaces for the LGBTQIA+ community, in partnership with @itgetsbetter. 🏳️‍🌈
“Home is a feeling. What better feeling to have than being accepted & valued by the people closest to us?”
#PrideMonth #Pride2021 #ItGetsBetter #CrateandBarrel

node.text:
A few months back, we asked you to share your love stories with us for a chance to win your dream wedding registry—and your responses were inspiring, tear-jerking, and lovely in every way. Carly & David, Logan & Michael and Shelby & Oliver were just a few of our Love&Gift contest winners, and their stories will stay with us forever. Tell us your love story in the comments. ↓
#WeddingRegistry #Wedding #Love

node.text:
Charcuterie is an entertaining staple (#fact). We curated four board ideas to get you and your partner’s hosting game going. Comment below your fave pairing. ↓

DESSERT FIRST: Rosé + all the desserts (plus feta or halloumi if you’re feeling cheesy) on our Wood and Marble Inlay Board. 
GAME NIGHT: Sparkling wine + aged manchego and brie + all the meats on our Isadore Round Board.
PARENTS’ VISIT: Pinot Grigio + ricotta or havarti (or hummus and dips if vegan) on our Carson Board.
DINNER FOR TWO: What you have left in the fridge + the newest show you’re bingeing on a few of our cutest boards.

Add these picks to your #WeddingRegistry for a lifetime of snacking bliss. 💍🧀🥖
#CharcuterieBoard #CheeseBoard #SnackBoard #Entertaining #SnackIdeas #Charcuterie #MeatAndCheeseBoard #DessertBoard #EntertainingIdeas #WinePairings #CheesePairings

node.text:
This is your sign to get a white couch. 🛋️ Our Plush Sectional, pictured here in stain-resistant and family-friendly Ivory fabric, is ready for your cozy fall. 

“I was drawn towards the Plush couch because it spoke to me as the perfect mixture of comfort and style. Plus, anyone who recreates their space as much as I do needs highly versatile pieces, and this modular couch is exactly that. It invites you into the room, providing plenty of comfortable seating options when we have company over and the perfect snuggle spot for my daughter and me.” -@angelafink

Tap to shop and head to crateandbarrel.com to shop all of Plush’s configurations and fabrics.
#WhiteSofa #WhiteCouch #LinenFabric #Sectional #LivingRoomStyle #LivingRoomDesign #NeutralHome #CozyHome #CozyCouch

node.text:
10/10 would snooze in our Runwell Upholstered Bed from our #ShinolaForCrate collab. 💤 🛏️ This modern bed frame somehow looks crisp and tailored AND welcoming and relaxed. (That’s the beauty of @shinola’s magic design touch.) The headboard is covered in a slubby flax-colored linen blend that's pleated at the edges for extra texture. And rich walnut veneer makes an appearance at the junctures, with rounded box joinery at the footboard corners.
#ShinolaForCrate #Shinola #ModernBed #ModernHome #BedFrame #LinenFabric #BedroomGoals #QueenBed #WalnutFurniture #IndustrialDesign

→ “The Taj Chair is like a piece of art and incredibly comfortable too! It’s the perfect accent piece to our mid-century modern home office. Little bit of a luxurious addition. node.text:
Full of irresistible, touchable texture and warmth, our Fall 2021 collection is officially dedicated to all the hugs we missed last year. 🤍 Starting with curves you want to trace with your fingertips in our Nouveau Curved Sectional, scalable from one section up to four (like pictured here) to fit your space. 🛋️〰️ Plus, it’s covered in a new high-performance upholstery called Opus that’s made from 40 recycle plastic water bottles per yard. And its frame is crafted of @fsc_us-certified wood from forests that are responsibly managed. 🌳
#CurvedSofa #PerformanceFabric #FamilyFriendly #StainResistant #Sustainable #SustainableFurniture #Sectional #WhiteCouch #WhiteSofa #LivingRoomGoals

node.text:
We 🖤 how mixed materials come to life in this dark & dreamy dining room. In our Enzo Cabinet, the upper portion has a glass shelf behind glass doors, letting you display prized pieces illuminated by LED lights. The Carrara marble countertop is the perfect work surface for cocktail prep, and its two closed doors conceal dinnerware or barware behind iron mesh. Tap through to shop the full room, including our Catalyst Dining Table that mixes and matches bases and tabletops in different combinations. 🤯🍽️
#DiningRoom #DiningTable #Cabinet #DiningCabinet #Table #MarbleTable #DiningChairs #DiningRoomInspiration #DiningRoomDesign
